epic.title: Timetable Management
epic.body: Provides conflict-free, flexible academic scheduling with visibility for teachers, students, and parents, and controlled override mechanisms for administrators.

features.title: Timetable Configuration
features.body: Configure core entities required for timetable creation.

stories.title: Subject configuration
stories.body: Create and manage subjects used in timetables.
acceptanceCriteria: Subjects can be created, edited, and deactivated
Subjects are scoped to organization and branch
Subjects can be mapped to classes and teachers

stories.title: Teacher-subject mapping
stories.body: Map teachers to subjects and classes.
acceptanceCriteria: Teachers can be mapped to multiple subjects

stories.title: Room and resource configuration
stories.body: Manage classrooms and other teaching resources.
acceptanceCriteria: Rooms can be created and managed
Rooms can be enabled or disabled

stories.title: Period and time-slot configuration
stories.body: Configure periods and time slots for the academic day.
acceptanceCriteria: Periods can be defined per day

features.title: Timetable Creation & Editing
features.body: Create and modify timetables with conflict detection.

stories.title: Manual timetable creation
stories.body: Allow admins to manually create class timetables.
acceptanceCriteria: Admins can assign subject, teacher, room, and period
Conflicts are detected in real time
Timetables can be saved as draft or published

stories.title: Auto-generate timetable
stories.body: Generate timetables automatically with basic conflict avoidance.
acceptanceCriteria: Teacher, room, and period conflicts are avoided
Generated timetable can be manually edited

stories.title: Drag-and-drop timetable editing
acceptanceCriteria: Subjects can be moved between periods

stories.title: Teacher timetable view
stories.body: Allow teachers to view their assigned timetable.
acceptanceCriteria: Teachers see only their assigned periods

stories.title: Student and parent timetable view
stories.body: Allow students and parents to view class timetables.
acceptanceCriteria: Parents see timetables of linked students

features.title: Teacher Swap & Overrides
features.body: Support teacher swap requests with approvals and audit history.

stories.title: Teacher swap request
stories.body: Allow teachers to request swaps for assigned periods.
acceptanceCriteria: Teachers can request swaps for future periods

stories.title: Swap approval workflow
stories.body: Allow admins to approve or reject swap requests.
acceptanceCriteria: Approvers can approve or reject swaps
All swap actions are audit logged

features.title: Timetable Non-Functional Requirements
features.body: Ensure performance, accuracy, and reliability of timetable operations.

stories.title: Timetable system NFRs
stories.body: Define non-functional requirements for timetable management.
